subsample_limit.help_text: minimum number of total reads (i.e. summing counts in both paired-end read files) to trigger read subsampling

subsample_iterations.help_text: number of iterations required for read subsampling, each randomly drawing reads from the input file

subsample_seed.help_text: random seed for read subsampling draw (this is the base number for the random seed actually used, which incorporates the iteration number to ensure different read sets are drawn between iterations)
